name: vue-cli-plugin-nativescript-vue-preset
description: Fixes most errors caused by installing <nativescript-vue> plugin. IMPORTANT: run "vue invoke nativescript-vue-preset" twice after adding. Adds .eslint.js, replaces ~tilde with @at paths & (fixes Unable to resolve path to module import/no-unresolved & import/extensions)
author: Vladyslav Piskunov <vlad@assuredlabs.com>
